item.title: Dogs Are More Work Than Kids, And You Can’t Convince This Dad Otherwise
item.description: Kids dress themselves, do their homework, watch out for one another, and have never started bouncing off the walls and tearing stuff up because no one...

item.title: Congress Should Strip Tax Exemptions From All Woke Nonprofits, Not Just Harvard
item.description: Leftist non-profits should lose their tax-exempt status. And there’s a very easy way to do it: all of them have DEI departments.

item.title: The More Christian That America Is, The Better Off American Jews Will Be
item.description: If wokeism, Islamism, and global neoliberalism are to be decisively rejected, then Americans should support fortifying the church.

item.title: The Breakfast Club Cast’s 40-Year Reunion Shows Why A Modern Remake Would Never Work
item.description: Maybe the cast could use a little more time in detention to think about what the film really means today.

item.title: China Expels Missionaries, Treating Christianity As Existential Threat To Totalitarianism
item.description: China is actively forcing all religious activity to align with Chinese culture and communism, and ensuring loyalty to the CCP.
